article.headline: Ark.-Little Rock 72, Centenary 64
article.story: LITTLE ROCK (AP) -- Shane Edwards scored 19 points and snared eight rebounds Tuesday night as Arkansas-Little Rock beat Centenary 72-64. Edwards' board efforts were overshadowed by teammate Mike Smith's 14 rebounds, though Edwards topped all players with 10-of-12 shooting from the free-throw line. UALR (3-1) dominated the first half with 48 percent shooting while holding the Gentlemen to just 31 percent accuracy from the field. Tyrone Hamilton led Centenary (3-2) with 19 points, with Nick Stallings scoring 12 and Jerrald Bonham adding 10. De'Andre Eggins added 14 points for the Trojans, with Brandon Patterson and Mike Smith scoring 10 points apiece.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
